post.body: What is this Wreckamovie thing?
Can you drum like the Animal? http://bit.ly/LFz3
Heheh, new MBP17 probably has 2 display cards anyway (like other unibodies), so 2 ext. ports _could_ work just fine. :)
Ainakin joskus joulunmaissa tulleessa OS X -päivityksessä oli ongelmia Soft.Updaten kautta. Ime combo update Applelta niin toiminee.
Thanks for the comment. Disqus is a great idea and apparently very easy to install as well.
Adblock Plus: http://bit.ly/LhkA - just configure it to not be so informative about itself and you're all set.
What I'd want: 2 external display ports in a Macbook Pro. Would be 3 screen workstation madness! :)
For the record: If Apple's new 17" Macbook Pro will not have a replaceable battery, I don't care! Gonna be great. Loving my current MBP17.
RT @mingyeow: @MrTweet addresses privacy concerns of its users amidst deep user concern over security ... http://blog.mrtweet.net/?p=91
3 Smart Things About Sleeping Late: http://bit.ly/4Rg4 - I knew it was a good thing!
Enjoying a semi-official work dat at Nordkapp HQ. Gotta shut dwon TweetDeck to get that small bit of work done. Tomorrow's a holiday again.
http://mrtweet.net/ tells you who you should be following in Twitter. Seems to work fine, although the results are a bit slow to arrive
It's -15C, super dark and I need to go to work for the first time in 2 weeks. Great!
Asus EEEPC 1000H running on Google’s mobile operating system Android: http://bit.ly/jDdD
My New Years resolutions for 2009: http://bit.ly/lmNM
Installing http://disqus.com/ commenting on my Tumblr blog at http://void.tumblr.com/ Anybody wanna try it out?
Excellent questions in Obama's new Change.gov crowd sourcing site. http://change.gov/page/content/openforquestions20081229/
RT @caseywright: 9.2 on the irony scale: http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/news/article2091812.ece
Dancing to Shamen with the boys at Nordkapp HQ. Rules.
Helsinki hits -12 Celsius. Winter finally starting?
